title: Comment on ``Singularities in axially symmetric solutions of Einstein-Yang Mills and related theories, by Ludger Hannibal, [hep-th/9903063]''
abstract: We point out that the statements in [hep-th/9903063] concerning the regularity of static axially symmetric solutions in Yang-Mills-dilaton (YMD) [1] and Einstein-Yang-Mills(-dilaton) (EYMD) theory [2,3] are incorrect, and that the non-singular local gauge potential of the YMD solutions [4] is twice differentiable.
